name: Alien's Playground
description:
This is my first video game build using Unity and help with Playground Project created by Ciro Continisio. The game has 1 level. You need to control your spaceship and evade various kind of attack, while you also need to collect energy points spread on the map, and charge the power station to launch the beam to wipe out enemies. In the normal version you only have to collect 40 energy points, and in the hard version you have to collect all of 50.

Remember being fast is not always good.

Manual:

WASD to control the direction

SPACE to reset the game
